I've just published an article (http://igorshare.wordpress.com/2008/09/04/prism-file-configuration-driven-bootstrapper/) of how to make sure that both unity and Prism modules to be loaded from the same config file. I think that this should be fixed in the Prism framework itself.
The simple thing is to make sure that the ConfigurationStore will not only look for files, but, as well, will read from a reconfigured one.

Read the full article and please leave comments: http://igorshare.wordpress.com/2008/09/04/prism-file-configuration-driven-bootstrapper/
